</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Get array with all items linked to a given weapon.
<template lineStart="1"><title>Important </title><part><name index="1"/><value> This command does not return loaded magazines, see [[weaponsItems]]</value></part></template>  </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit '''weaponAccessories''' weapon </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> weapon: [[String]] - primary, secondary or handgun  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - [silencer, laserpointer/flashlight, optics, bipod]</value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[weaponAccessories]] [[primaryWeapon]] [[player]]; //["","acc_pointer_IR","optic_Aco",""]</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[weaponAccessoriesCargo]], [[handgunItems]], [[primaryWeaponItems]], [[secondaryWeaponItems]], [[weaponsItems]], [[weaponsItemsCargo]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on October 26, 2014 - 08:48 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Killzone Kid|Killzone Kid]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
To check if currently selected muzzle has a silencer:
<code>hasSilencer = [[player]] [[weaponAccessories]] [[currentMuzzle]] [[player]] [[param]] [0, ""] != "";</code>
</dd>
</dl>
